page.title: 16A TEENAGER'S IMPRESSION
page.content: Upon entering this block from the city of Gloucester,the thing which I immediately noticed was the lack of housing-most of the area being arable crop land.There are only 2 settlements in the area and a few farm houses. {Highnam}seems to be a medium sized village consisting mainly of a large estate of recently built houses.The majority of inhabitants are commuters working in and around Gloucester. {Tibberton},on the other hand,is a village of mostly old houses.Most of the population seem to be middle aged and retired couples. The major land use in the block is arable farming,especially cereals and oil-seed rape.
